entry.title: BIP 20 Rejected, process for BIP 21N
entry.summary: In an email conversation on Jan 31, 2012, Matt Corallo expressed his concerns over using variable names for providing information and asked for a better idea for backward compatibility. In response, Wladimir suggested the use of an abbreviated prefix such as "mustimplement:" instead of relying on variable names. He also recommended this to keep URL sizes small for QR codes and similar purposes.
